fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Make a player constant at night, learning all of the players they’ve visited in the past, at the cost of 5 points.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: During the day, choose one of the players you just learned in the previous night. That player becomes “Solved 1 by 1” and the following night, the constant player will be redirected to visit them.
